means: 解开（某物的）结( untangle的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: After much tugging, the rope untangled itself and straightened out.
sentence.Network_cn: 拉了好久才把缆绳解开弄直.

sentence.Network_en: She untangled her hair from the hair - drier.
sentence.Network_cn: 她把搅在吹风机上的头发松开了.

sentence.Network_en: With deft fingers she untangled the wire.
sentence.Network_cn: 她用灵巧的手指解开了金属线.

PerfectNetExp.abs: She untangled her hair from the hair - drier ., 她把搅在吹风机上的头发松开了.

list.abs: I can ' t untangle these figures ., 我算不清这些数字.
Can you untangle this thread for me ? I ' m all thumbs today ., 你能帮我解开这条线吗 ? 我今天笨手笨脚的.
if i untangle you , will you please get rid of the cornrows ., 如果我解开你 , 你会解开这个稻穗头.
what method untangle to choose when is the mood bad appropriate ?心情不好时选什么方法排解适宜？

entry.def: If you untangle something that is knotted or has become twisted around something, you undo the knots in it or free it.

example.ex: He was found desperately trying to untangle several reels of film.
example.tran: 他被撞见拼命想要解开几盘缠在一起的胶卷。

example.ex: ...a light, non-sticky mousse which untangles hair and adds brilliant shine.
example.tran: 一种能理顺头发、增加其光泽的轻柔、无黏性的摩丝

entry.tran: 排解，解决，处理（混乱或复杂的局面）
entry.def: f you untangle a confused or complicated situation, you make the different things involved clear, or put the situation right.

example.ex: Lawyers and accountants began trying to untangle the complex affairs of the bank...
example.tran: 律师和会计师开始着手梳理这家银行复杂的事务。

example.ex: The problem took three hours to untangle.
example.tran: 这个问题花了3个小时才解决。

auth_sentence.content: It had untangled fifteen tunas, most of them carcasses, and two rays.
auth_sentence.res_content: It had untangled fifteen tunas, most of them carcasses, and two rays.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It had untangled fifteen tunas, most of them carcasses, and two rays.

auth_sentence.content: Months, and possibly years, may pass before Stanford's finances are untangled.
auth_sentence.res_content: Months, and possibly years, may pass before Stanford's finances are untangled.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Months, and possibly years, may pass before Stanford's finances are untangled.

auth_sentence.content: The crew also untangled a cable on Atlantis' inspection boom and fixed a loose antenna on the station.
auth_sentence.res_content: The crew also untangled a cable on Atlantis' inspection boom and fixed a loose antenna on the station.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The crew also untangled a cable on Atlantis' inspection boom and fixed a loose antenna on the station.
